attributes.action: Anti-Islamic Practice bringing disgrace to Islam, Ban the EID dinner on Ashura.
attributes.additional_details: The Cheadle mosque and Community Centre has recently published an event called Cheadle Mosque's Annual Eid Dinner at  The Sheridan Suite 371, Oldham Road, M40 8RR on Saturday 30th Sept 2017 which is the night of 10th Muharram, the day when Islamic Prophet's Holly Household martyred along with his family to save Islam. We request the Government to take an action against this non-Islamic event and ban this event and monitor this mosques activities in future.
attributes.background: Cheadle Mosque & Community center is organizing an EID dinner on the night of Ashura (10th Muharram). This is the day Holly Prophet grandson was martyred. We urge the UK Government to stop this event and take a strong action against this mosque organizer 4 causing stress to the True Islam followers
